text: He is here and she is here.
translate: Ell és aquí i ella és aquí.
Londres és a la Gran Bretanya.

text: Peter and Martha are from Berlin.
translate: Peter i Martha són de Berlín.

text: Do both of you speak German?
Madrid and Berlin are also capital cities.
translate: Madrid i Berlín també són capitals.

text: Capital cities are big and noisy.
translate: Les capitals són grans i sorolloses.
El Japó es troba a l’Àsia.
El Canadà es troba a l’Amèrica del Nord.
El Panamà es troba a l’Amèrica Central.
El Brasil es troba a l’Amèrica del Sud.
El primer dia és el dilluns.
El segon dia és el dimarts.
El tercer dia és el dimecres.
El quart dia és el dijous.
El cinquè dia és el divendres.
El setè dia és el diumenge.

text: We only work for five days.
In which hotel are you staying?
How long have you been here for?
How long will you be staying?

translate: Li agrada la seva estada aquí?

text: Shall we see each other tomorrow?
I am sorry, but I already have plans.
translate: Em sap greu, però ja tinc ocupacions.

text: We are having class / a lesson.
We want to speak with people.
Do you drink tea with lemon?
Do you drink coffee with sugar?
Do you drink water with ice?
People are drinking wine and beer.
translate: La gent beu vi i cervesa.

text: Do you drink Coke with rum?

translate: Al nadó li agrada la llet.

text: The child likes cocoa and apple juice.
translate: Al nen / A la nena li agrada el cacau i el suc de poma.

text: The woman likes orange and grapefruit juice.
translate: A les dones els agrada el suc de taronja i el suc d'aranja.

text: Where do they like to go?
They like to listen to music.
Where do they not like to go?
They do not like to dance.

translate: Quina hora és, si us plau?

text: I was at the cinema yesterday.

translate: El Peter i la Martha són amics / parella.
El Peter és l’amic / el xicot de la Martha.
La Martha és l’amiga / la xicota del Peter.
La taronja és de color taronja.
La terra és de color marró.
El núvol és de color gris.
Els pneumàtics són de color negre.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the snow? White.
translate: De quin color és la neu? Blanca.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the sun? Yellow.
translate: De quin color és el sol? Groc.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the orange? Orange.
translate: De quin color és la taronja? Taronja.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the cherry? Red.
translate: De quin és la cirera? Vermell.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the sky? Blue.
translate: De quin color és el cel? Blau.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the grass? Green.
translate: De quin color és l’herba? Verda.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the earth? Brown.
translate: De quin color és la terra? Marró.

text: What colour / color (am.) is the cloud? Grey / Gray (am.).
translate: De quin color és el núvol? Gris.

text: What colour / color (am.) are the tyres / tires (am.)? Black.
translate: De quin color són els pneumàtics? Negre.

text: What would you like to drink?
Do you play a musical instrument?
translate: Que toca algun instrument musical vostè?

text: I am currently reading this book.
What do you like to read?
Do you like to go to concerts?
Do you like to go to the theatre / theater (am.)?
Do you like to go to the opera?
We are cleaning the apartment today.

translate: Jo netejo la cambra de bany.

text: My husband is washing the car.
translate: El meu marit renta el cotxe.

text: The children are cleaning the bicycles.
The children are cleaning up the children’s room.
translate: Els nens ordenen l’habitació dels nens.

text: My husband is tidying up his desk.
translate: El meu marit ordena el seu escriptori.

text: I am putting the laundry in the washing machine.
translate: (Jo) poso la roba a la rentadora.

text: I am hanging up the laundry.
Does it disturb you if I smoke?

translate: Sí, però són sobretot viatges de negocis.
Aquestes són les estacions de l’any:

text: We like to go for a walk in summer.
It snows or rains in winter.
We like to stay home in winter.
translate: A l'hivern, ens encanta estar a casa.

text: What is the weather like today?
I have a kiwi and a melon.
translate: (Jo) tinc un kiwi i un meló.

text: I have an orange and a grapefruit.
translate: (Jo) tinc una taronja i una aranja.

text: I have an apple and a mango.
translate: (Jo) tinc una poma i un mango.

text: I have a banana and a pineapple.
translate: (Jo) tinc un plàtan / una banana i una pinya americana.

text: I am making a fruit salad.

translate: (Jo) menjo una torrada de pa / una llesca de pa torrat.

text: I am eating toast with butter.
translate: (Jo) menjo una torrada de pa / una llesca de pa torrat amb mantega.

text: I am eating toast with butter and jam.
translate: (Jo) menjo una torrada de pa / una llesca de pa torrat amb mantega i melmelada.

text: I am eating a sandwich with margarine.
I am eating a sandwich with margarine and tomatoes.
translate: (Jo) menjo un entrepà amb margarina i tomàquet.

text: We need carrots and tomatoes for the soup.
translate: Necessitem pastanagues i tomàquets per a la sopa.

text: Do you have a new kitchen?
What do you want to cook today?
Do you cook on an electric or a gas stove?
translate: Que tens cuina elèctrica o de gas?

text: Do you have a tin opener / can opener (am.)?
Do you have a bottle opener?
Are you cooking the soup in this pot?
translate: Que prepares la sopa en aquesta olla?

text: Are you frying the fish in this pan?
translate: Que fregeixes el peix en aquesta paella?

text: Are you grilling the vegetables on this grill?
translate: Que fas torrar les verdures a la barbacoa?

text: Here are the knives, the forks and the spoons.
translate: Aquí hi ha els ganivets, les forquilles i les culleres.

text: Here are the glasses, the plates and the napkins.
translate: Aquí hi ha els gots, els plats i els tovallons.
El celler es troba a baix.

text: There is a garden behind the house.
translate: Hi ha un jardí darrera de la casa.

text: There is no street in front of the house.
translate: No hi ha cap carrer davant de la casa.

text: There are trees next to the house.
translate: Hi ha arbres al costat de la casa.

text: The kitchen and bathroom are here.
translate: Aquí és la cuina i el bany.

text: The living room and bedroom are there.
translate: Aquí són la sala d'estar i la cambra.

text: We are going to the living room.
There is a sofa and an armchair there.
translate: Hi ha un sofà i una butaca.
La meva cadena estèreo és allà.

text: The TV set is brand new.
I waited for you for half an hour.
Don’t you have a mobile / cell phone (am.) with you?

translate: Pren un taxi la pròxima vegada!

text: Take an umbrella with you next time!
translate: Emporta’t un paraigua la pròxima vegada!

text: I have the day off tomorrow.
I’m sorry, I can’t make it tomorrow.
translate: Em sap greu, demà no puc.

text: Do you already have plans for this weekend?
translate: Has planejat alguna cosa per aquest cap de setmana?

text: Or do you already have an appointment?
translate: O ja has quedat amb algú?

text: I suggest that we meet on the weekend.
translate: Proposo que ens vegem aquest cap de setmana.
Què et sembla si fem un pícnic?

text: Shall we go to the beach?
translate: Què et sembla si anem a la platja?

text: Shall we go to the mountains?
translate: Què et sembla si anem a la muntanya?

text: I will pick you up at the office.
translate: Et vinc a buscar a l'oficina.

text: I will pick you up at home.
translate: Et vinc a buscar a casa.

text: I will pick you up at the bus stop.
translate: Et vinc a buscar a la parada d'autobús.

text: I would like the menu, please.
translate: Voldria la carta, si us plau.

text: I’d like a coffee with milk.
I’d like a tea with lemon.
I’d like a tea with milk.
Do you have a vacant room?
What does the room cost per night?
I would like a room with a bathroom.
I would like a room with a shower.
Is there a fax machine here?
What time do you serve breakfast?
translate: A quina hora se serveix l'esmorzar?

text: What time do you serve lunch?
translate: A quina hora se serveix el dinar?

text: What time do you serve dinner?
translate: A quina hora se serveix el sopar?

text: I would like to go to the station.
I would like to go to the airport.
I would like to go to the city centre / center (am.).
translate: M'agradaria anar al centre de la ciutat.

text: How do I get to the station?
How do I get to the airport?
How do I get to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Com vaig al centre de la ciutat?
Em fa falta un pla de la ciutat.

text: I would like to rent a car.

translate: Aquí teniu la meva targeta de crèdit.
Aquí teniu el meu permís de conduir.

text: What is there to see in the city?
translate: Què s’ha de visitar a la ciutat?

text: Go on a harbour / harbor (am.) tour.
Are there any other places of interest?
translate: Quines altres atraccions turístiques hi ha?

text: There is no telephone in the room.
translate: No hi ha telèfon a l’habitació.

text: There is no TV in the room.
translate: No hi ha televisió a l’habitació.
És massa car per a mi.

text: Do you see the tower there?
Is there a youth hostel nearby?
translate: Hi ha un alberg de joventut al barri?

text: Is there a boarding house / a bed and breakfast nearby?
translate: Hi ha una casa d'hostes al barri?
Hi ha un restaurant per aquí?

text: Do you see the mountain there?
Do you see the village there?
Do you see the river there?
Do you see the bridge there?
Do you see the lake there?
Yes, and I also speak some Italian.
translate: Sí, i també parlo una mica d'italià.

text: I think you speak very well.
But speaking and writing is difficult.
translate: Però parlar-ne i escriure’n és difícil.
No dubti a corregir-me, si us plau.
La seva pronunciació és molt bona.

text: You only have a slight accent.
One can tell where you come from.
What is your mother tongue / native language (am.)?
translate: Quina és la seva llengua materna?

text: Are you taking a language course?
translate: Que fa algun curs de llengua vostè?

text: I don’t remember the name right now.
translate: Ara mateix no me'n recordo del nom.

text: The title is not coming to me.
translate: El títol no em ve a la memòria.

text: I would like an ice cream with whipped cream.
I would like some fruit or cheese.
We would like to have breakfast.
We would like to have lunch.
We would like to have dinner.
What would you like for breakfast?

translate: Un altre iogurt, si us plau.

text: Some salt and pepper also, please.
translate: Una mica més de sal i pebre, si us plau.
Un altre got d'aigua, si us plau.

text: I’d like chips / French fries (am.) with ketchup.
translate: Una porció de patates fregides amb quetxup.
I tres salsitxes torrades amb mostassa.

text: Do you also like to eat leek?
Do you also like to eat sauerkraut?
Do you also like to eat lentils?
Do you also like to eat carrots?
Do you also like to eat broccoli?
Do you also like to eat peppers?

translate: Un suc de poma, si us plau.
Un suc de tomàquet, si us plau.

text: I’d like a glass of red wine.
translate: M'agradaria una copa de vi negre.

text: I’d like a glass of white wine.
translate: M'agradaria una copa de vi blanc.

text: I’d like a bottle of champagne.
I’d like something that won’t take much time.
translate: M'agradaria una cosa que no trigui gaire temps.

text: Would you like that with rice?
Would you like that with pasta?
Would you like that with potatoes?

translate: Això no és el que he demanat.

text: Is that the train to Berlin?
translate: Que és aquest el tren a Berlín?

text: When does the train arrive in Berlin?
translate: Quan arriba el tren a Berlín?

text: I think this is my seat.
translate: Crec que és el meu seient.

text: I think you’re sitting in my seat.
translate: Crec que vostè està assegut al meu lloc.

text: The sleeper is at the end of the train.
translate: El cotxe-llit és a la cua del tren.

text: And where is the dining car? – At the front.
translate: On és el restaurant? – En el cap.

text: Can I sleep in the middle?
Can I sleep at the top?
When will we get to the border?
How long does the journey to Berlin take?
translate: Quant dura el viatge a Berlín?

text: Do you have something to read?
Can one get something to eat and to drink here?
translate: Que es pot demanar de menjar i beure aquí?

text: Could you please wake me up at 7 o’clock?
translate: Em podeu despertar a les 7:00 del matí?
Si us plau, em pot trucar un taxi?

text: What does it cost to go to the station?
translate: Quant costa fins a l'estació de tren?

text: What does it cost to go to the airport?

translate: A la dreta, si us plau.

text: Please turn left at the corner.
translate: Prengui la primera a l'esquerra a la cantonada, si us plau.
Vagi més a poc a poc, si us plau.
Esperi un moment, si us plau.
Doni'm un rebut, si us plau.

text: That is okay, please keep the change.
Where is the next gas station?
translate: On és la benzinera més pròxima?

text: I have a flat tyre / tire (am.).
Can you change the tyre / tire (am.)?
I need a few litres / liters (am.) of diesel.
translate: Necessito un parell de litres de dièsel.

text: I have no more petrol / gas (am.).
Do you have a petrol can / jerry can / gas can (am.)?
Where can I make a call?

translate: On és el telèfon més pròxim?

text: Do you have a mobile / cell phone (am.) with you?

translate: El vostre permís de conduir, si us plau.
La documentació del vehicle, si us plau.

text: Where is the tourist information office?
Do you have a city map for me?
translate: Em podria donar un pla de la ciutat vostè?

text: Can one reserve a room here?
translate: Es pot reservar una habitació d'hotel aquí?

text: I would like a guide who speaks German.
translate: Voldria un guia que parli alemany.

text: I would like a guide who speaks Italian.
translate: Voldria un guia que parli italià.

text: I would like a guide who speaks French.
translate: Voldria un guia que parli francès.

text: Is there a good restaurant around here?
translate: On hi ha un bon restaurant per aquí?

text: Take a left at the corner.
translate: Giri a l'esquerra a la cantonada.

text: Then go straight for a while.
Then go right for a hundred metres / meters (am.).
translate: Després vagi cent metres a la dreta.

text: You can also take the bus.
You can also take the tram.
You can also follow me with your car.
translate: També em pot seguir en cotxe.

text: How do I get to the football / soccer (am.) stadium?
translate: Com vaig a l’estadi de futbol?

text: Drive until you reach the third traffic light.
Then turn into the first street on your right.
translate: Després prengui el primer carrer a la dreta.

text: Then drive straight through the next intersection.
translate: Continui tot dret en el pròxim encreuament.

text: Excuse me, how do I get to the airport?
It is best if you take the underground / subway (am.).
translate: El millor és agafar el metro.

text: Simply get out at the last stop.
I also have a video camera.
translate: També tinc una càmera de vídeo.

text: Where can I find a battery?
There is a café over there.
There is a restaurant over there.
Where are the gorillas and the zebras?
translate: On són els goril•les i les zebres?

text: Where are the tigers and the crocodiles?
translate: On són els tigres i els cocodrils?

text: When is the next train to Berlin?
translate: Quan surt el pròxim tren cap a Berlín?

text: When is the next train to Paris?
translate: Quan surt el pròxim tren cap a París?

text: When is the next train to London?
translate: Quan surt el pròxim tren cap a Londres?

text: When does the train for Warsaw leave?
translate: A quina hora surt el tren que va a Varsòvia?

text: When does the train for Stockholm leave?
translate: A quina hora surt el tren que va a Estocolm?

text: When does the train for Budapest leave?
translate: A quina hora surt el tren que va a Budapest?

text: I’d like a ticket to Madrid.
I’d like a ticket to Prague.
I’d like a ticket to Bern.
When does the train arrive in Vienna?
translate: Quan arriba a Viena el tren?

text: When does the train arrive in Moscow?
translate: Quan arriba a Moscou el tren?

text: When does the train arrive in Amsterdam?
translate: Quan arriba a Amsterdam el tren?

text: Do I have to change trains?
From which platform does the train leave?
translate: De quina andana surt el tren?

text: I’d like a one-way ticket to Brussels.
translate: Voldria un bitllet d’anada a Brussel•les.

text: I’d like a return ticket to Copenhagen.
translate: Voldria un bitllet d’anada i tornada a Copenhaguen.

text: What does a berth in the sleeper cost?
translate: Quant costa una plaça al cotxe-llit?

text: I’d like to book a flight to Athens.
translate: M'agradaria reservar un seient en el vol a Atenes.
Un lloc al costat de la finestra per a no fumadors, si us plau.

text: I would like to confirm my reservation.
I would like to cancel my reservation.
I would like to change my reservation.
When is the next flight to Rome?
translate: Quan és el pròxim vol a Roma?

text: No, we have only one seat available.
translate: No, ja només queda un lloc lliure.

text: When does a bus go to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Quan surt un autobús que va al centre de la ciutat?

text: How much luggage can I take?
We want to go to the cinema.
A good film is playing today.
How much are the admission tickets?
I want to sit at the back.
translate: Vull seure a la part de darrere.

text: I want to sit at the front.
translate: Vull seure a la part davantera.

text: I want to sit in the middle.
But the book on which the film was based was better.
translate: Però el llibre és millor que la pel•lícula.

text: Is it dangerous to hitchhike alone?
translate: Que és perillós fer autoestop sol?

text: Is it dangerous to go for a walk at night?
translate: Que és perillós passejar a la nit?

text: Is there a parking lot here?
translate: Que hi ha una zona d’estacionament aquí?

text: How long can one park here?
translate: Quant de temps puc estacionar aquí?

text: Do you take the ski lift to the top?
translate: Que puja amb el teleesquí vostè?

text: Isn’t it dangerous to swim there?
Can one rent a sun umbrella / parasol here?
translate: És possible llogar un para-sol aquí?

text: Can one rent a deck chair here?
translate: És possible llogar una gandula aquí?

text: Can one rent a boat here?
translate: És possible llogar un vaixell aquí?

text: I would like to water ski.

translate: És possible llogar una taula de surf?
És possible llogar l’equipament de submarinisme?
Que has portat les botes d'esquí?
On és la parada de l'autobús?

text: Which bus goes to the city centre / center (am.)?
translate: Quin autobús va al centre de la ciutat?

text: Which bus do I have to take?
Where do I have to change?
How much does a ticket cost?
How many stops are there before downtown / the city centre?
translate: Quantes parades hi ha fins al centre?

text: You have to get off here.
You have to get off at the back.
The next train is in 5 minutes.
translate: El pròxim metro arriba d’aquí cinc minuts.

text: The next tram is in 10 minutes.
translate: El pròxim tramvia arriba d’aquí deu minuts.

text: The next bus is in 15 minutes.
translate: El pròxim autobús arriba d’aquí quinze minuts.

text: A ticket? – No, I don’t have one.
Then you have to pay a fine.
translate: Llavors vostè ha de pagar una multa.

text: Are you here for the first time?
translate: És la primera vegada que és aquí vostè?

text: No, I was here once last year.
translate: No, ja hi vaig ser l'any passat.

text: How do you like it here?
translate: Li agrada el nostre país / la nostra ciutat?

text: A lot. The people are nice.
translate: Molt. La gent és molt amable.

text: And I like the scenery, too.
No, my wife / my husband is also here.
translate: No, la meva dona / el meu marit també és aquí.

text: And those are my two children.
translate: I allà són els meus dos fills.

text: Is the market open on Sundays?
translate: Que el mercat és obert el diumenge?

text: Is the fair open on Mondays?
translate: Que obre la fira el dilluns?

text: Is the exhibition open on Tuesdays?
translate: Que és oberta l'exposició el dimarts?

text: Is the zoo open on Wednesdays?
translate: Que el obre zoològic el dimecres?

text: Is the museum open on Thursdays?
translate: Que el obre museu el dijous?

text: Is the gallery open on Fridays?
translate: Que la galeria obre el divendres?

text: Does one have to pay an entrance fee?
How much is the entrance fee?
Is there a discount for groups?
translate: Hi ha descompte per a grups?

text: Is there a discount for children?
translate: Hi ha descompte per als nens?

text: Is there a discount for students?
You have to pack our suitcase!
translate: Has de fer la nostra maleta!
No t’en pots oblidar de res!

text: Don’t forget your traveller’s cheques / traveler’s checks (am.)!
translate: No oblidis els teus xecs de viatge!

text: Take some suntan lotion with you.
Take the sun hat with you.
Do you want to take a road map?
translate: Et vols endur un mapa de carreteres?

text: Do you want to take a travel guide?
translate: Et vols emportar una guia de viatge?

text: Do you want to take an umbrella?
Remember to take pants, shirts and socks.
translate: Pensa en pantalons, camises i mitjons.

text: Remember to take ties, belts and sports jackets.
translate: Pensa en corbates, cinturons i jaquetes.

text: Remember to take pyjamas, nightgowns and t-shirts.
translate: Pensa en pijames, camises de nit i samarretes.

text: How do you like the music?
You need shoes, sandals and boots.
translate: Et fan falta sabates, sandàlies i botes.

text: You need handkerchiefs, soap and a nail clipper.
translate: Et fan falta mocadors, sabó i un tallaungles.

text: You need a comb, a toothbrush and toothpaste.
translate: Et fa falta una pinta, un raspall de dents i pasta dental.

text: But the band plays very well.
translate: Ara bé, la banda toca molt bé.

text: No, this is the first time.

translate: Ja hi arriba d’allà al fons!

text: Shall we go to the swimming pool?
translate: I si anem a la piscina?

text: Do you have a bathing suit?
Can you jump in the water?

translate: On són les ulleres de natació?

text: I am getting out of the water now.
I want to go to the library.
I want to go to the bookstore.
I want to go to the newspaper stand.
I want to borrow a book.
I want to buy a book.
I want to buy a newspaper.
I want to go to the library to borrow a book.
translate: Vull anar a la biblioteca per manllevar un llibre.

text: I want to go to the bookstore to buy a book.
translate: Vull anar a la llibreria per comprar un llibre.

text: I want to go to the kiosk / newspaper stand to buy a newspaper.
translate: Vull anar al quiosc a comprar el diari.

text: I want to go to the optician.
I want to go to the supermarket.
I want to go to the bakery.
translate: Vull anar al forn de pa / a la fleca.

text: I want to buy some glasses.
I want to buy fruit and vegetables.
I want to buy rolls and bread.
I want to go to the optician to buy glasses.
translate: Vull anar ca l’òptic per comprar un parell d'ulleres.

text: I want to go to the supermarket to buy fruit and vegetables.
translate: Vull anar al supermercat per comprar fruites i verdures.

text: I want to go to the baker to buy rolls and bread.
translate: Jo vull anar a la fleca per comprar pastes i pa.

text: We’re looking for a sports shop.
We’re looking for a butcher shop.
We’re looking for a pharmacy / drugstore (am.).
We want to buy a football.
translate: És que voldríem comprar una pilota de futbol.

text: We’re looking for a sports shop to buy a football.
translate: Busquem una botiga d'esports per comprar una pilota de futbol.

text: We’re looking for a butcher shop to buy salami.
translate: Busquem una carnisseria per comprar salami.

text: We’re looking for a drugstore to buy medicine.
translate: Busquem una farmàcia per comprar medicaments.

text: I’m looking for a jeweller / jeweler (am.).
I’m looking for a photo equipment store.
I actually plan to buy a ring.
translate: És que tinc la intenció de comprar un anell.

text: I actually plan to buy a roll of film.
translate: És que tinc la intenció de comprar un rodet de fotos.

text: I want to buy a present.
I actually plan to buy a cake.
translate: És que tinc la intenció de comprar un pastís.

text: I’m looking for a jeweler to buy a ring.
translate: Busco un joier per comprar un anell.

text: I’m looking for a photo shop to buy a roll of film.
translate: Busco un fotògraf per comprar un rodet de fotos.

text: I’m looking for a confectionery to buy a cake.
translate: Busco una pastisseria per comprar un pastís.

text: A large one or a small one?
May I see this one, please?
Or is it made of plastic?
And the bag is really very reasonable.
translate: I la bossa és realment a un bon preu.

text: Can I exchange it if needed?
translate: La puc tornar, si de cas?

text: What do you do for a living?
I work as a nurse part-time.
translate: (Jo) treballo com a infermera a temps parcial.

text: We will soon receive our pension.

translate: I l'assegurança de salut és cara.

text: What would you like to become some day?
I would like to become an engineer.
I want to go to college.
I am doing an internship abroad.
translate: Estic fent unes pràctiques a l'estranger.
Aquest és el meu cap / el meu "jefe".

text: We always go to the cafeteria at noon.
translate: Al migdia, sempre anem a la cantina.

text: I am looking for a job.
I have already been unemployed for a year.
translate: Estic desocupat des de fa un any.

text: There are too many unemployed people in this country.
translate: Hi ha massa desocupats en aquest país.
Tinc una cita amb el metge.

text: I have the appointment at ten o’clock.
translate: Tinc una cita a les deu en punt.

text: Please take a seat in the waiting room.
translate: Si us plau, assegui’s a la sala d'espera.

text: The doctor is on his way.
What insurance company do you belong to?
What can I do for you?

translate: Que li fa mal alguna cosa?
A vegades em fa mal la panxa.
Tregui’s la part de dalt, si us plau!

text: Lie down on the examining table.
translate: Si us plau, estiri’s a la llitera!

text: I will give you an injection.
Where is the nearest post office?
translate: On és l'oficina de correus més propera?

text: Is the post office far from here?
translate: Quina és la distància fins a l'oficina de correus més pròxima?

text: Where is the nearest mail box?
translate: On és la bústia més pròxima?

text: I need a couple of stamps.
I will give you some pills.
I am giving you a prescription for the pharmacy.
translate: Li dono una recepta per a la farmàcia.

text: For a card and a letter.
translate: Per a una postal i una carta.

text: How much is the postage to America?
translate: Quant costa el franqueig per a Amèrica?

text: Can I send it by air mail?
translate: Que el puc enviar per via aèria?

text: How long will it take to get there?
translate: Quant de temps triga fins que arriba?

text: Where can I make a call?
Where is the nearest telephone booth?
translate: On és la cabina telefònica més pròxima?
Que té una targeta de telèfon?

text: Do you have a telephone directory?
Do you know the area code for Austria?
translate: Sap el codi per trucar a Àustria?

text: One moment, I’ll look it up.
You have to dial a zero first!
translate: Primer ha de marcar el zero!
On hi ha una discoteca per aquí?
On hi ha un club nocturn per aquí?
Que hi ha cap bar per aquí?

text: What’s playing at the theatre / theater (am.) this evening?
translate: Què hi ha aquesta nit al teatre?

text: What’s playing at the cinema / movies (am.) this evening?
translate: Què fan aquesta nit al cinema?
Què hi ha aquesta nit a la televisió?

text: Are tickets for the theatre / theater (am.) still available?
translate: Encara hi ha entrades per al teatre?

text: Are tickets for the cinema / movies (am.) still available?
translate: Encara hi ha entrades per al cinema?

text: Are tickets for the football / soccer am. game still available?
translate: Encara hi ha entrades per al partit de futbol?

text: I want to sit in the back.
I want to sit somewhere in the middle.
I want to sit at the front.

translate: Em pot recomanar alguna cosa vostè?

text: Can you get me a ticket?
Is there a golf course nearby?
translate: Que hi ha un camp de golf per aquí?

text: Is there a tennis court nearby?
translate: Que hi ha una pista de tennis a prop?

text: Is there an indoor swimming pool nearby?
translate: Que hi ha una piscina coberta per aquí?

text: We feel like. / We want to.
We don’t feel like. / We do’t want to.
Shall we go to the department store?
I want to do a lot of shopping.

translate: Necessito sobres i paper de cartes.

text: I need a cupboard and a chest of drawers.
translate: Necessito un armari i una calaixera.

text: I need a desk and a bookshelf.
translate: Necessito un escriptori i una prestatgeria.

text: I need a doll and a teddy bear.
translate: Necessito una nina i un osset de peluix.

text: I need a football and a chess board.
translate: Necessito una pilota de futbol i un joc d'escacs.

text: I need a hammer and a pair of pliers.
translate: Necessito un martell i unes alicates.

text: I need a drill and a screwdriver.
translate: Necessito un trepant i un tornavís.

text: Where is the jewellery / jewelry (am.) department?
I need a chain and a bracelet.
translate: Necessito una cadena i una polsera.

text: I need a ring and earrings.

translate: On és la pista de tennis?

text: Where is the football / soccer (am.) field?
translate: On és el camp de futbol?

text: My foot and hand also hurt.
translate: El peu i la mà també em fan mal.

text: I have a car / an automobile.
I also have a jacket and a pair of jeans.
translate: També tinc una jaqueta i uns pantalons texans.

text: I have a knife, a fork and a spoon.
translate: Tinc un ganivet, una forquilla i una cullera.

text: Where is the salt and pepper?
translate: On són la sal i el pebre?

text: No, I don’t understand them so well.
Six months make half a year.
Where has he left his glasses?
translate: On ha posat les seves ulleres?

text: The clock hangs on the wall.
translate: El rellotge està enganxat a la paret.

text: The children cannot find their parents.
translate: Els nens no poden trobar els seus pares.
Però ja arriben els seus pares!

text: How was your trip, Mr. Miller?
translate: Com va anar el seu viatge, senyor Müller?

text: Where is your wife, Mr. Miller?
translate: On és la seva dona, senyor Müller?

text: How was your trip, Mrs. Smith?
translate: Com va anar el seu viatge, senyora Schmidt?

text: Where is your husband, Mrs. Smith?
translate: On és el seu marit, senyora Schmidt?

text: I am a member of a sports club.
There is a football / soccer (am.) stadium in our city.
translate: A la nostra ciutat, hi ha un estadi de futbol.

text: There is also a swimming pool with a sauna.
translate: També hi ha una piscina amb sauna.

text: And there is a golf course.
translate: I hi ha un camp de golf.
Què hi ha a la televisió?

text: There is a football / soccer (am.) match on now.
translate: Hi ha un partit de futbol.

text: The German team is playing against the English one.
translate: L'equip alemany juga contra l'equip anglès.

text: Do the students learn a lot?
Do you often ask the teacher questions?
No, I don’t ask him questions often.
Yes, he is working right now.
No, it costs only one hundred Euros.
Do you want some more soup?

translate: Que fa gaire que vius aquí?

text: But I already know a lot of people.
translate: Però ja conec un munt de gent.
No, només els caps de setmana.

text: But I will be back on Sunday.

translate: La teva filla ja és major d'edat?

text: But she already has a boyfriend.
The man is wearing a hat.
One cannot see the ears either.
One cannot see his back either.
I am drawing the eyes and the mouth.
translate: Dibuixo els ulls i la boca.

text: The man is dancing and laughing.
The man has a long nose.
He is carrying a cane in his hands.
translate: (Ell) porta un bastó a les mans.

text: He is also wearing a scarf around his neck.
translate: També porta una bufanda al voltant del coll.

text: It is winter and it is cold.
The man is made of snow.
He is neither wearing pants nor a coat.
translate: (Ell) no porta ni pantalons ni abric.

text: But the man is not freezing.

translate: El nostre avi és molt vell.

text: 70 years ago he was still young.
A woman who weighs a hundred kilos is fat.
translate: Una dona de cent quilos és grassa.

text: A man who weighs fifty kilos is thin.
translate: Un home de cinquanta quilos és prim.

text: I want to make a call.
I want to send an email.
Is there a sheet of paper and a pen here?
translate: Hi ha un full de paper i un bolígraf?

text: Are you already allowed to drive?
translate: Que ja pots conduir un cotxe?

text: Are you already allowed to drink alcohol?
Are you already allowed to travel abroad alone?
translate: Que ja pots pots anar sol a l'estranger?

text: May one pay by credit card?
translate: Es pot pagar amb targeta de crèdit?

text: May one pay by cheque / check (am.)?
May one only pay in cash?
translate: Es pot pagar només en efectiu?

text: May I just make a call?
He is not allowed to sleep in the park.
He is not allowed to sleep in the car.
He is not allowed to sleep at the train station.
What do you want to do?
Do you want to play football / soccer (am.)?
Do you want to visit friends?
I don’t want to arrive late.
I don’t want to go there.
I want to stay at home.
Do you want to stay here?
Do you want to eat here?
Do you want to sleep here?
Do you want to leave tomorrow?
Do you want to stay till tomorrow?
Do you want to pay the bill only tomorrow?
Do you want to go to the disco?
Do you want to go to the cinema?
Do you want to go to a café?

translate: No gaire curt, si us plau.
Una mica més curt, si us plau.

text: The pictures are on the CD.
translate: Les fotos són en el CD.

text: The pictures are in the camera.
translate: Les fotos són a la càmera.

text: Can you clean the pants / trousers?
Do you have a match or a lighter?
translate: Que teniu llumins o un encenedor?
Que li agradaria fumar a vostè?
Que li agradaria ballar a vostè?

text: Would you like to go for a walk?
translate: Que li agradaria passejar a vostè?

text: I want to relax a little.
I want to ask you something.
I want to ask you for something.
I want to treat you to something.

translate: Què li agradaria prendre, si us plau?

text: Or do you prefer a tea?
They want to make a call.
Do you know where his key is?
translate: Saps on és la seva clau?

text: Do you know where his ticket is?
translate: Saps on és el seu bitllet?

text: And her credit card is also gone.
translate: La seva targeta de crèdit també ha desaparegut.
La nostra àvia està bé de salut.
Nens, on és el vostre pare?
Nens, on és la vostra mare?

text: I am not coming because the weather is so bad.
translate: No vinc perquè el clima és molt dolent.

text: He isn’t coming because he isn’t invited.
translate: No ve perquè no és convidat.

text: I am not coming because I have no time.
translate: No vinc perquè no tinc temps.

text: I am not staying because I still have to work.
translate: No em quedo perquè encara haig de treballar.

text: I’m going because it is already late.
translate: Me’n vaig perquè ja és tard.

text: He is staying in a hotel.
He is staying in a cheap hotel.
translate: Ell s’allotja en un hotel barat.

text: He is reading a boring novel.
She is watching an exciting movie.
I didn’t come because I was ill.
translate: No vaig venir perquè estava malalt / -a.

text: She didn’t come because she was tired.
translate: No va venir perquè estava cansada.

text: He didn’t come because he wasn’t interested.
translate: No ha vingut perquè no en tenia ganes.

text: We didn’t come because our car is damaged.
translate: No hem vingut perquè el cotxe se’ns va espatllar.
Per què no ha vingut la gent?

text: They didn’t come because they missed the train.
translate: No han vingut perquè han perdut el tren.

text: I didn’t come because I was not allowed to.
translate: No he vingut perquè no podia fer-ho.

text: I was talking on the phone all the time.
translate: He trucat per telèfon tota l’estona.
Li he explicat tota la història.

text: How did you pass the exam?
How did you find the way?
With whom did you make an appointment?
With whom did you celebrate your birthday?
translate: Amb qui celebra el seu aniversari?

text: What did you come to know?
I am wearing a blue dress.
I am wearing a red dress.
I am wearing a green dress.
An old lady lives at the top.
translate: A dalt hi viu una dona gran / vella.

text: A fat lady lives at the top.
translate: A dalt hi viu una dona grassa.
A baix hi viu una dona curiosa.
Els nostres convidats eren gent simpàtica.
Els nostres convidats eren gent educada.
Els nostres convidats eren gent interessant.

text: But the neighbours have naughty children.
translate: Però els veïns tenen uns nens maleducats.
Que es porten bé els seus fills?

text: Which newspaper did you subscribe to?
Why did you become a teacher?
Why did you take a taxi?
translate: Per què ha agafat un taxi?

text: Did you have to call an ambulance?
translate: Havies de trucar a una ambulància?

text: Did you have to call the doctor?
Did you have to call the police?
translate: Havies de trucar a la policia?

text: Do you have the telephone number? I had it just now.
translate: Té el número de telèfon? Fa no res el tenia.

text: Do you have the address? I had it just now.
translate: Té l’adreça? Fa no res la tenia.

text: Do you have the city map? I had it just now.
translate: Té el pla de la ciutat? Fa no res el tenia.

text: Did he come on time? He could not come on time.
translate: Va venir a l’hora? No va poder venir a l’hora.

text: Did he find the way? He could not find the way.
translate: Que va trobar el camí? No va poder trobar el camí.

text: Did he understand you? He could not understand me.
Why could you not come on time?
translate: Per què no vas poder arribar a l’hora?

text: Why could you not find the way?
translate: Per què no vas poder trobar el camí?

text: Why could you not understand him?
translate: Per què no el podies entendre?

text: I could not come on time because there were no buses.
translate: No vaig poder arribar a l’hora perquè no anaven els autobusos.

text: I could not find the way because I had no city map.
translate: No vaig poder trobar el camí, perquè no tenia un pla de la ciutat.

text: I could not understand him because the music was so loud.
translate: No el podia entendre perquè la música estava molt alta.

text: I had to take a taxi.
translate: Vaig haver de prendre un taxi.

text: I had to buy a city map.
translate: Vaig haver de comprar un pla de la ciutat.

text: I had to switch off the radio.

translate: He respost a totes les preguntes.

text: I know that – I knew that.
I write that – I wrote that.
I hear that – I heard that.
I’ll get it – I got it.
Why aren’t you eating the cake?
translate: Per què no menja el pastís?

text: I’m not eating it because I must lose weight.
translate: (Jo) no menjo perquè he de perdre pes.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the beer?
translate: Per què no es beu la cervesa?

text: I’ll bring that – I brought that.
I’ll buy that – I bought that.
I expect that – I expected that.
I’ll explain that – I explained that.
I know that – I knew that.
I’m not drinking it because I have to drive.
translate: Jo no bec perquè encara haig de conduir.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the coffee?
translate: Per què no et beus el cafè?

text: I’m not drinking it because it is cold.
translate: Jo no me’l bec perquè està fred.

text: Why aren’t you drinking the tea?
translate: Per què no et beus el te?

text: I’m not drinking it because I don’t have any sugar.
translate: No me’l bec perquè no tinc sucre.

text: Why aren’t you eating the soup?
translate: Per què no es menja la sopa?

text: I’m not eating it because I didn’t order it.
translate: No me la menjo perquè no l’he demanada.

text: Why don’t you eat the meat?
translate: Per què no menja la carn?

text: I’m not eating it because I am a vegetarian.
translate: No la menjo perquè sóc vegetarià.

text: We must go to school at once.
translate: Hem d'anar de seguida a l'escola.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: We must go to work at once.
translate: Hem d'anar de seguida a treballar.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: We must go to the doctor at once.
translate: Hem d’anar de seguida al metge.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the bus.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the train.

chapter: to have to do something / must
text: You must wait for the taxi.
I would like to open an account.

translate: I aquesta és la meva adreça.

text: I want to deposit money in my account.
translate: M'agradaria dipositar diners al meu compte.

text: I want to withdraw money from my account.
translate: Voldria treure diners del meu compte.

text: I want to pick up the bank statements.
translate: Voldria rebre el meu extracte de compte.

text: I want to cash a traveller’s cheque / traveler’s check (am.).
translate: Voldria fer efectiu un xec de viatge.

text: I’m expecting a transfer from Germany.

translate: Aquest és el meu número de compte.

text: Could you please give me small notes / bills (am.)?
translate: Doni'm bitllets petits, si us plau.

text: Is there a cashpoint / an ATM (am.)?
translate: Que hi ha un caixer automàtic?

text: How much money can one withdraw?
Which credit cards can one use?
translate: Quines són les targetes de crèdit que es poden utilitzar?

text: Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
translate: El temps probablement serà millor demà.

text: I hope that it gets better.
Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.

translate: El nostre cap és ben plantat.
Fins i tot em sembla molt guapo.

text: The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
translate: El cap segur que té una xicota.

text: It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
translate: És ben possible que tingui una xicota.

text: You are so lazy – don’t be so lazy!
translate: Ets molt mandrós – No siguis tan mandrós!

text: You sleep for so long – don’t sleep so late!
translate: Dorms molt de temps – No dormis tant de temps.

text: You come home so late – don’t come home so late!
translate: Arribes molt tard – No vinguis tan tard!

text: You laugh so loudly – don’t laugh so loudly!
translate: Rius molt fort – No riguis tan fort!

text: You speak so softly – don’t speak so softly!
translate: Parles molt baix – No parlis tan baix!

text: You drink too much – don’t drink so much!
You smoke too much – don’t smoke so much!
You work too much – don’t work so much!
You drive too fast – don’t drive so fast!
translate: Condueixes molt ràpid – No condueixis tan ràpid!
Espera fins que deixi de ploure.

text: I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
translate: Espero fins que se m’eixuguin els cabells.

text: I’ll wait until the film is over.
translate: Espero fins que acabi la pel•lícula.

text: I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
translate: Espero que es posi verd el semàfor.

text: When do you go on holiday?
Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
translate: Sí, abans que comencin les vacances d'estiu.

text: Repair the roof before the winter begins.
translate: Repara el teulat abans que comenci l'hivern.

text: Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
translate: Renta’t les mans abans de seure a taula.

text: Close the window before you go out.
translate: Tanca la finestra abans de sortir.

text: Yes, after the class is over.
translate: Sí, després que s’hagi acabat la classe.

text: After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: Després d'haver tingut un accident, ja no podia treballar.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
translate: Després de perdre el seu lloc de treball, se’n va anar a Amèrica.

text: After he went to America, he became rich.
translate: Després d'anar als Estats Units, es va fer ric.
I ella va escriure una postal.

text: She took a piece of chocolate.
translate: Ella va agafar un tros de xocolata.

text: He was disloyal, but she was loyal.
translate: Ell era infidel, però ella era fidel.

text: He was lazy, but she was hard-working.
translate: Ell era mandrós, però ella era treballadora.

text: He was poor, but she was rich.
translate: Ell era pobre, però ella era rica.

text: He had no money, only debts.
translate: Ell no tenia diners, sinó deutes.

text: He had no luck, only bad luck.
translate: Ell no tenia sort, sinó mala sort.

text: He had no success, only failure.
translate: Ell no tenia èxit, sinó fracassos.

text: He was not satisfied, but dissatisfied.
translate: Ell no era feliç, sinó infeliç.

text: He was not happy, but sad.
translate: Ell no tenia sort, sinó mala sort.

text: He was not friendly, but unfriendly.
translate: Ell no era simpàtic, sinó antipàtic.

text: Since when is she no longer working?
translate: Des de quan ja no treballa?

text: Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: Sí, ella no treballa des que es va casar.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
translate: Des que es va casar, ella ja no treballa.

text: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
translate: D’ençà que es coneixen són feliços.

text: Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: Des que tenen nens, surten poc.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
She listens to music while she does her work.
translate: Escolta la música mentre fa els deures.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
translate: No veig res quan no tinc les ulleres.

text: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: No entenc res quan la música està tan forta.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
translate: No sento res quan tinc un refredat.

text: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translate: Recorrerem el món si guanyem la loteria.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: Comencarem el menjar si no arriba aviat.

text: My son did not want to play with the doll.
translate: El meu fill no volia jugar amb nines.

text: My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
translate: La meva filla no volia jugar a futbol.

text: My wife did not want to play chess with me.
translate: La meva dona no va voler jugar amb mi als escacs.

text: My children did not want to go for a walk.
translate: Els meus fills no van voler fer una passejada.

text: They did not want to tidy the room.
They did not want to go to bed.
translate: Ells no volien anar al llit.

text: He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
He was not allowed to eat sweets.
I was allowed to make a wish.
I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
translate: Em vaig poder comprar un vestit.

text: I was allowed to take a chocolate.
translate: Vaig poder prendre un bombó de praliné.

text: Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
translate: Que podies beure cervesa a l'hospital?

text: Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
translate: Que podies portar el gos a l'hotel?

text: During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: Durant les vacances, els nens podien estar a fora fins tard.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: Podien jugar molt de temps al pati.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
We had to water the flowers.
We had to clean the apartment.
We had to wash the dishes.
Did you have to pay the bill?
translate: Vau haver de pagar la factura?

text: Did you have to pay an entrance fee?
Did you have to pay a fine?
translate: Vau haver de pagar la multa?

text: Who had to go home early?
translate: Qui havia d'anar-se’n a casa d'hora?

text: Who had to take the train?
translate: Qui havia de prendre el tren?

text: We did not want to stay long.
We did not want to drink anything.
We did not want to disturb you.
I just wanted to make a call.
I just wanted to call a taxi.
Actually I wanted to drive home.
I thought you wanted to call your wife.
translate: Pensava que volies trucar a la teva dona.

text: I thought you wanted to call information.
translate: Pensava que volies trucar a Informació.

text: I thought you wanted to order a pizza.
translate: Pensava que volies encarregar una pizza.

text: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
translate: Em llevo tan aviat com sona el despertador.

text: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
translate: Em canso tan aviat he d'estudiar.

text: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
translate: Plegaré de treballar tan aviat com tingui 60 anys.

text: As soon as I have a moment.
He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
I’ll work as long as I can.
I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
translate: Treballaré mentre estigui en bona salut.

text: He lies in bed instead of working.
translate: Es queda al llit en comptes de treballar.

text: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
translate: (Ella) llegeix el diari en lloc de cuinar.

text: He is at the bar instead of going home.
translate: (Ell) està assegut al bar en lloc d'anar a casa.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
translate: Pel que jo sé, (ell) viu aquí.

text: As far as I know, his wife is ill.
translate: Pel que jo sé, la seva dona està malalta.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
translate: Pel que jo sé, ell està a l'atur.

text: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: M’he adormit, si no hauria arribat a temps.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: He perdut l'autobús, si no hauria arribat a temps.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: No he trobat el camí, si no hauria arribat a temps.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
No, I don’t know anyone here.
a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
translate: Que es quedarà encara més temps?

text: No, I won’t stay here much longer.
translate: No, ja no em quedaré més temps aquí.

text: Would you like to drink something else?
translate: Encara vol alguna cosa més de beure?

text: No, I don’t want anything else.
No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
translate: No, encara no he menjat res.

text: Does anyone else want a coffee?
I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
I’m angry that you come so late.
I think he needs a doctor.
translate: Crec que (a ell) li feia falta un metge.

text: I think he is sleeping now.
We hope that he marries our daughter.
translate: Esperem que es casi amb la nostra filla.

text: We hope that he has a lot of money.
We hope that he is a millionaire.
I heard that your wife had an accident.
translate: He sentit que la teva dona ha tingut un accident.

text: I heard that she is in the hospital.
translate: He sentit que (ella) és a l'hospital.

text: I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
translate: He sentit que el teu cotxe està completament destruït.

text: I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
translate: M’alegro que vulgui comprar la casa.

text: I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translate: Em temo que l'últim autobús ja se n'ha anat.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
translate: Em temo que haurem d’agafar un taxi.

text: I’m afraid I have no more money.
translate: Em temo que no porto diners.

text: He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translate: Es va quedar adormit encara que la televisió estava encesa.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
translate: Es va quedar tot i que ja era tard.

text: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
translate: Ell no va venir tot i que ens haviem citat.

text: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
translate: La televisió estava encesa. Tot i això, es va quedar adormit.

text: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translate: Ja era tard. Tanmateix, encara es va quedar.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
translate: Ens haviem citat. Tanmateix, ell no va venir.

text: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: Encara que no té permís de conduir, condueix.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translate: Encara que la carretera està coberta de gel, condueix molt ràpidament.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: Encara que està borratxo, va en bicicleta.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: No té permís de conduir. Tanmateix, condueix.

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: La carretera està coberta de gel. Tanmateix, condueix molt de pressa.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
translate: Està borratxo. Tot i això, va en bicicleta.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: No troba feina encara que ha estudiat.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: (Ella) no va al metge encara que li fa mal.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: (Ella) compra un cotxe encara que no té diners.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: Ella ha estudiat. Tot i això, no troba una feina.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: (A ella) li fa mal. Tot i així, no va al metge.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: No té diners. Tot i això, es compra un cotxe.
el gat de la meva amiga
Aquest és l’abric del meu col•lega.
Aquest és el cotxe del meu col•lega.
Aquest és el treball dels meus col•legues.

text: The button from the shirt is gone.
translate: El botó de la camisa se m’ha caigut.
La clau del garatge no hi és.

text: The boss’ computer is not working.

translate: Qui són els pares de la nena?

text: How do I get to her parents’ house?
translate: Com arribo a la casa dels seus pares?

text: The house is at the end of the road.
translate: La casa és al cap del carrer.

text: What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
translate: Com es diu la capital de Suïssa?

text: What is the title of the book?
translate: Quin és el títol d'aquest llibre?

text: What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
translate: Com es diuen els nens dels veïns?
Quan són les vacances dels nens?

text: What are the doctor’s consultation times?
translate: Quines són les hores de consulta del metge?

text: What time is the museum open?
translate: Quins són els horaris d'obertura del museu?

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
translate: El viatge va ser sens dubte bonic, però massa esgotador.

text: The train was on time, but too full.
translate: El tren va arribar puntual, però mass ple.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
translate: L'hotel era sens dubte agradable, però massa car.

text: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
translate: Pren o l'autobús o el tren.

text: He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: Ve o aquesta nit o demà al matí.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
translate: Es queda a casa nostra o bé a l'hotel.

text: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
translate: Ella parla no només espanyol sinó també anglès.

text: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translate: Ella vivia no només a Madrid, sinó també a Londres.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
translate: Ella coneix no solament Espanya, sinó també Anglaterra.

text: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: No només és estúpid, sinó també mandrós.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: Ella no només és bonica, sinó també intel•ligent.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: Ella parla no solament alemany, sinó també francès.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: No sé tocar ni el piano ni la guitarra.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: No sé ballar ni el vals ni la samba.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: No m'agrada l'òpera ni el ballet.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: Com més ràpid treballis, més d’hora acabaràs.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: Com més aviat vinguis, més d’hora te’n podràs anar.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: Com més grans ens fem, més ens acomodem.

text: I don’t know if he loves me.
I don’t know if he’ll come back.
I don’t know if he’ll call me.

translate: Si em trucarà? No ho sé.

text: I wonder if he thinks about me.
translate: Em pregunto si pensa en mi.

text: I wonder if he has someone else.
translate: Em pregunto si en té una altra.
No sé si pensa en mi.
No sé si en té una altra.

text: Maybe he tells me the truth?
translate: No sé si diu la veritat.

text: I doubt whether he really likes me.
I doubt whether he’ll write to me.
I doubt whether he’ll marry me.
translate: Dubto que es casi amb mi.
Si li agrado? No ho sé.
Si es casarà amb mi? No ho sé.
